attributes.description: An excellent value hatchback offering a long list of standard features and ultra low mileage for the year model. This 2016 Kia Rio Tec model has only done 67 000 kilometers with a full service history. Standard features include front and rear fog lights, alloy wheels, rear park assist, leather interior, climate control, a multi function steering wheel, electric windows and mirrors, adjustable steering column and drivers seat, a radio system with Bluetooth and a manual 6 speed gearbox

attributes.description: First Car? City runabout? Economical hatchback? This Renault Sandero ticks all the boxes. attributes.description: A perfect, slightly larger hatchback LOADED with standard equipment - this 2020 Baleno has your name written all over it. Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. 


Definitely A Must See, Please Call/WhatsApp DE REV AUTOS to View All Vehicle,

1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometer vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 
2. All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assurance check 
3. Over 1,000 popular makes and models of used cars available 
4. Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot
5. Finance available with all banks Neat and Immaculate Condition.
 
Going for both CASH / FINANCE! If you would like to come view or tests drive the vehicle, we are situated at 658 LOUIS BOTHA AVEUNE WYNBERG SANDTON JOHANNESBURG 2090.
